connect.connectingError: An error occured while connecting to the device
connect.pairFirst: You first have to pair a device in the bluetooth settings before you can connect to it via the Snow Height app.
connect.selectToConnect: Select one of the following devices to connect. The devices has to be a SnowHeight probe.
connect.title: SnowHeight

report.dataStored: The data was saved to the SD-card.
report.failedExplanation: Failed transmission were automatically repeated. This means that even if the graphic above shows many failed transmission, the data was still transferred successfully.
report.title: Transmission report

settings.loadError: An error occured while loading the settings from the device
settings.saveError: The settings could not be saved successfully
settings.settingDescriptionBluetoothCode: This is the PIN which is required to pair with the weather probe.
settings.settingDescriptionBluetoothName: This is the name as which the weather probe will appear to nearby bluetooth devices.
settings.settingDescriptionLaserInterval: This is the interval in which the laser will perform its measurements. The unit of this setting is „minutes“.
settings.title: Settings
